page.title: 18Our favourite foods
page.content: I did a survey about favourite foods. First I asked about meals.Most children liked chips because of the taste and the texture.But chips are not good for you and people are beginning to be more concerned about having good foods.Another food that stood out was fish and fishfingers. Fried food like this is not healthy either but if it is grilled it is better.Most people didn't like fresh vegetables beause of the taste which is strong.The texture too puts people off.These foods are good for you.I also asked about snacks.All the children eat between meals.Most liked sweets like chocolate bars.But some preferred crisps which are better for your teeth.In fact half the class have had one or more fillings probably because of the sugar in sweets which decays teeth.
